org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Class AeExecutionQueue

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeExecutionQueue
public class AeExecutionQueue
extends java.lang.Object

Used in conjunction with the process to ensure that we're only executing a single object at a time. Simply add objects to the queue to have them get executed.

Nested Class Summary
private  class AeExecutionQueue.AeBaseResumeObjectStub
          Base stub class for resuming objects in a faulting state.
private  class AeExecutionQueue.AeCompleteObjectStub
          An AeExecutableStub subclass that will call objectCompleted on its faulting AeAbstractBpelObject when it is executed.
private  class AeExecutionQueue.AeExecutableObjectStub
          Base class for stub objects that can be executed by executeObject.
private  class AeExecutionQueue.AeResumeFaultedProcessToTerminationStub
          An AeExecutableStub subclass that will call objectCompletedWithFault on its faulting AeAbstractBpelObject when it is executed.
 class AeExecutionQueue.AeRunnableObjectStub
          A executable queue object that accepts a Runnable.

Constructor Detail

AeExecutionQueue

public AeExecutionQueue(IAeBusinessProcessInternal aProcess)
Constructs empty queue.

Parameters:
aProcess -

AeExecutionQueue

public AeExecutionQueue(IAeBusinessProcessInternal aProcess,
                        boolean aSuspended,
                        java.util.List aQueue)
Construct execution queue from a specific list of objects.

Parameters:
aProcess - the owner process
aSuspended - flag for whether execution is suspended
aQueue - initial queue of objects
Method Detail

add

protected void add(IAeExecutableQueueItem aObject)
            throws AeBusinessProcessException
Adds the object to the execution queue. If the queue is already executing then the object will be executed when its turn comes. If the queue isn't being executed, then adding an object for execution will immediately start the execution process.

Parameters:
aObject -
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

isExecuting

private boolean isExecuting()
Returns true if the queue is currently being executed. Called from the add method to see if the queue is being executed. If not, then the add process will start the queue executing.

execute

protected void execute()
                throws AeBusinessProcessException
Pops an object off the queue and executes it. Once called, this method will run until there are no more objects to execute.

Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

hasObjectsToExecute

private boolean hasObjectsToExecute()
Returns true if there are objects in the queue to execute

getNextObjectToExecute

private IAeExecutableQueueItem getNextObjectToExecute()
Gets the next object from the queue to execute.

executeObject

private void executeObject(IAeExecutableQueueItem aExecutable)
                    throws AeBusinessProcessException
Calls the object's execute method.

Parameters:
aExecutable -
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

isQuiescent

private boolean isQuiescent()
Returns true if and only if this execution queue is quiescent.

isSuspended

private boolean isSuspended()
Returns true if and only if this execution queue is suspended.

getLocationPaths

public java.util.List getLocationPaths()
Returns the location paths of the objects in this queue in the same order as the queue.

addFaultingObject

public void addFaultingObject(AeAbstractBpelObject aFaultedObject,
                              IAeFault aUncaughtFault)
                       throws AeBusinessProcessException
Add the faulting object to the execution queue and resume its execution.

Parameters:
aFaultedObject -
aUncaughtFault -

                        throws AeBusinessProcessException
Add the object to be completed to the execution queue and complete it.

Parameters:

Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

resume

public void resume(boolean aExecute)
            throws AeBusinessProcessException
Resumes execution of objects in the queue.

Parameters:
aExecute - true to execute immediately or false to put the queue in a running state without executing immediately.
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

resume

public void resume(java.lang.String aLocationPath)
            throws AeBusinessProcessException
Checks the suspended execution queue and resumes the specified object if it is in the queue.

Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

suspend

public void suspend()
Marks this execution queue as suspended.
